GSD.product_version: versions from v2.6.22 to before v5.10.137
GSD.description:
video: fbdev: arkfb: Fix a divide-by-zero bug in ark_set_pixclock()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.137 by commit 0288fa799e273b08839037499d704dc7bdc13e9a, it was introduced in version v2.6.22 by commit 681e14730c73cc2c71af282c001de6bc71c22f00. For more details please see the references link.
